thread.title: How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal

title: How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal
text:
How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal 2:54am IST - 01:58 
The photo-sharing site may be worth more than 80 times what the social network founded by Mark Zuckerberg paid six years ago. Now, though, the data leaks engulfing its corporate parent risk becoming a liability.   
The photo-sharing site may be worth more than 80 times what the social network founded by Mark Zuckerberg paid six years ago. Now, though, the data leaks engulfing its corporate parent risk becoming a liability.  //reut.rs/2IWjfpc
